title: 所以，win10版怎么领……
author: IceFairyCirno
txt_content:
换了个win10，换完就想到能领win10版，然后就去https://account.mojang.com/me点了Claim your free copy，据说是会跳转到微软商店的页面，但是我似乎并没有被跳转，还是留在在mojang的页面……

我：




Y@YO]]6}79EEJD%ZFA1~R61.jpg (1.54 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-12-14 20:54 上传

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content:
在去年9月份的时候已经结束了，现在要单独购买
如果你是去年9月前买Java正版的话不受影响

replies.author: MC深坑不回头
replies.txt_content:
这问题很久了...现在有java正版要换win10版都会出现一行
Error! It looks like we've temporarily run out of gift codes for Minecraft for Windows 10. Don't worry though, more codes should be on their way. Please check back later!
告诉你没了...数位版还能没了吗?!

replies.txt_content:

17年买的

点了显示没有key啊。。。。第一次好像刷出来了但是我去商店不能激活。。。。然后一直显示key 用完了

https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/ ...
我觉得我的界面好像不太一样？我这边是
“You bought Minecraft: Java Edition during a period of time when Minecraft for Windows 10 was included for free. Claim your redeemable gift code by clicking the button below and follow the instructions. As you might have guessed, Minecraft for Windows 10 can only be played on Windows 10.”
下面按钮就“claim your free copy”，然后点了没反应emmmmmm
